div.class: cff-item cff-video-post cff-status-post author-mt-pleasant-public-schools cff-146152182145743 cff-new

div.p: 3 days ago
Melissa Hockridge In district How am I or any parent saposed to support our children with learning disability. The packets are a one size fits all.
Thank you Dana for being there for both of my kids when they were at the middle school-Best of luck in your new adventure..You will be missed..
Thanks for all the hard work of MPPS staff!
Congrats to the Class of 2020!
Thank you, Dana! ❤️
Ted McIntyre is so deserving of this honor!!
Is this going to affect options for balanced calendar next year?
Are packets available for high school students?
Thank you Dana!
Stay safe MPS
What are they doing for kindergarten kick off?
What are we doing for graduation?
Thank you for your leadership, Jennifer Ireland Verleger!
Will meals be provided to kids in this manner all summer?
How do we update our email ?
Thanks, Coach Mac!
When last day Covid 19
Poop
Cristy Mcphall

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-album author-mt-pleasant-public-schools cff-146152182145743 cff-new

div.p: 4 days ago

p.span:
MP Families!
Today is hot lunch day!! We are serving corn dogs!
Lunch is served from 11:00-1:00 at MPHS and Ganiard! Our bus routes are posted here too!
Hope to see you soon!!
💙💛💙💛
#OilerPride

img.alt:
MP Families!
Today is hot lunch day!! We are serving corn dogs!
Lunch is served from 11:00-1:00 at MPHS and Ganiard! Our bus routes are posted here too!
Hope to see you soon!! 💙💛💙💛 #OilerPride

div.p: 1 week ago

p.span:
MP Families —
💙 Be sure to come out today and grab a breakfast and lunch! We will be set up at MPHS and Ganiard from 11:00-1:00. Our bus routes are off and rolling too! Here is the schedule.
💛We have Nutrition Club Bags today for every child thanks to our good friends at the Community Compassion Network!
💙 We also have special bags to hand out from our amazing staff and the very generous folks at the Care Store!!
💛 You don’t want to miss us today! Please remember to practice social distancing when approaching our sites and buses.
💙Thank you to all of our staff members and volunteers! We could not do this without you!!
💛 Have a wonderful weekend!
#OilerPride

img.alt:
MP Families —
💙 Be sure to come out today and grab a breakfast and lunch! We will be set up at MPHS and Ganiard from 11:00-1:00. Our bus routes are off and rolling too! Here is the schedule.
💛We have Nutrition Club Bags today for every child thanks to our good friends at the Community Compassion Network!
💙 We also have special bags to hand out from our amazing staff and the very generous folks at the Care Store!!
💛 You don’t want to miss us today! Please remember to practice social distancing when approaching our sites and buses.
💙Thank you to all of our staff members and volunteers! We could not do this without you!!
💛 Have a wonderful weekend!
#OilerPride

div.p: Thank you volunteers for all that you’re doing!
Yes thank you so much !

img.alt: Photo of school kids smiling with their hands up

div.p: Empower Excellence
div.div: To create an inclusive school community of engaged, inspired and empowered learners.

div.p:
Jennifer Verleger
Ph: 989-775-2301 | Email: jverleger@mp.edzone.net

Deb Ervin
Ph: 989-775-2301 | Email: dervin@mp.edzone.net

720 N. Kinney, Mt. Pleasant, MI 48858
Phone: 989-775-2300 | Fax: 989-775-2309

It is the policy of the Mt. Pleasant Public Schools not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, creed or ancestry, age, sex, height, weight, marital status, sexual orientation or disability in educational programs, activities or services and to comply with all requirements and regulations of the United States Department of Education. In addition, arrangements can be made to ensure that the lack of English language skills is not a barrier to admission or participation. Questions or concerns regarding compliance with this policy may be directed to the: Assistant Superintendent for Human Resources at Mt. Pleasant Public Schools, 720 N. Kinney Ave., Mt. Pleasant, MI 48858, (989) 775-2303
